trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for localization features to a root designer.
trans-unit.target: 對根設計工具提供當地語系化 (Localization) 功能的設計階段支援。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider> can extend an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> with a set of properties and methods that provide support for the .NET Framework localization architecture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider> 可以擴充<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner>與一組屬性和方法，以支援.NET Framework 當地語系化架構。

trans-unit.source: For more about using resources, see [Localization](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/localization.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊使用的資源，請參閱[當地語系化](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/localization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The localization support architecture enables designers to initialize component properties using resource files that can be swapped at run time to support a variety of languages, culture-specific styles and dynamically configurable features.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化支援架構可讓設計工具，可初始化元件使用的資源檔，您可以在執行階段以支援各種不同的語言、 文化特性特定樣式及動態的可設定功能交換的內容。

trans-unit.source: You can use the methods of this class to enable designers and code generating serializers to load from resources and build initialization code that uses localization features.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個類別的方法，讓設計工具和程式碼產生序列化程式，從資源載入和建置使用當地語系化功能的初始化程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The default serializers that ship with Visual Studio are already capable of localizing components and controls, but they only do so if they locate support for the .NET Framework localization architecture.
trans-unit.target: 隨附於 Visual Studio 的預設序列化程式已能夠當地語系化元件和控制項，但它們才能進行這些找出.NET Framework 當地語系化架構的支援。

trans-unit.source: To detect the presence of localization support, the serialization system must locate a public <xref:System.Boolean> property named "Localizable" on the root designer component.
trans-unit.target: 若要偵測的當地語系化支援存在，序列化系統必須找出公用<xref:System.Boolean>根設計工具元件上名為"Localizable"的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If a serializer finds this property, it searches for a property of type <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> named "Language" to determine the current resource configuration.
trans-unit.target: 如果序列化程式會發現這個屬性，它會搜尋屬性的型別<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>名為"Language"，以判斷目前的資源設定。

trans-unit.source: Default serializers use these properties to determine if it should localize any localizable resources of the component, and if so, what <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> format the resource information should be saved in.
trans-unit.target: 預設序列化程式會使用這些屬性來判斷如果它應該當地語系化的元件，任何可當地語系化的資源，而且如果是，什麼<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>格式應該在儲存的資源資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider> to a component.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider>元件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example includes an example component and designer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例包含範例元件和設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The designer uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider> to add localization support properties for the component.
trans-unit.target: 在設計工具會使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider>新增元件的當地語系化支援屬性。

trans-unit.source: A service provider for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 指定元件的服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: The base component to localize.
trans-unit.target: 要當地語系化的基底元件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider" /> class using the specified service provider and base component.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定服務提供者 (Provider) 和基底元件，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: By default, a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider> sets the current language to <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A>, which is the generic and default language resource setting.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，新<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider>將目前的語言設定為<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A>，這是泛型，且預設的語言資源設定。

trans-unit.source: This setting causes a designer to generate code that references the generic language resource.
trans-unit.target: 這項設定會導致設計工具產生程式碼與參考的泛用的語言資源。

trans-unit.source: You can create other <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> objects to represent and identify other localized resource data that a program can use at run time.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立其他<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件來代表，並找出其他當地語系化的程式可以在執行階段使用的資源資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立新<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider>物件。

trans-unit.source: The object to receive the extender properties.
trans-unit.target: 要接收擴充項屬性的物件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this object can provide its extender properties to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 指示這個物件是否可以將它的擴充項 (Extender) 屬性提供給指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this object can provide extender properties to the specified object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個物件能夠提供擴充項屬性給指定的物件則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider" /> 使用的資源。

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 處置 (Dispose) <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider" /> 所使用的資源 (除了記憶體之外)。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider.Dispose%2A> 使用完畢時，請呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider.Dispose%2A> 方法會將 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider> 保留在無法使用的狀態。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider.Dispose%2A>，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider>所佔用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 在您釋放最後一個 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider.Dispose%2A> 參考之前，請務必呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider> 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LocalizationExtenderProvider>參考。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: The object to get the current resource culture for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其取得目前資源文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current resource culture for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定物件的目前資源文化特性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> indicating the resource variety.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />，表示資源種類。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the current resource culture used to access resource data for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回目前用來存取指定之物件的資源資料的資源文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The object to get the resource culture for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其取得資源文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default resource culture to use when initializing the values of a localized object at design time.
trans-unit.target: 取得預設資源文化特性，在設計階段初始化當地語系化物件的值時使用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> indicating the resource culture to use to initialize the values of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />，表示要用來初始化指定物件的值的資源文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The object to check for localization support.
trans-unit.target: 檢查當地語系化支援的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified object supports resource localization.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示指定的物件是否支援資源當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified object supports resource localization; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的物件支援資源當地語系化，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to reset the resource culture for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其重設資源文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: Resets the resource culture for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 重設指定物件的資源文化特性。

trans-unit.source: If the specified object was initialized with localized resources when the designer loaded, this method sets the resource culture for the specified object to the resource culture used to initialize the values of the specified object when the designer loaded.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的物件已初始化與當地語系化的資源，設計工具載入時，這個方法會設定指定之物件的資源文化特性資源文化特性，用來載入設計工具時，初始化指定之物件的值。

trans-unit.source: If the specified object had no previous resource culture setting, the current resource culture is set to <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的物件不有任何先前的資源的文化特性設定，設定為目前的文化特性資源<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The base component to set the resource culture for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其設定資源文化特性的基底元件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> that indicates the resource culture to use.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />，表示要使用的資源文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current resource culture for the specified object to the specified resource culture.
trans-unit.target: 將指定物件的目前資源文化特性設定為指定的資源文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The base component to set as localizable or not localizable.
trans-unit.target: 要設定為可當地語系化或不可當地語系化的基底元件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the object supports resource localization; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件支援資源當地語系化，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets a value indicating whether the specified object supports localized resources.
trans-unit.target: 設定數值，表示指定的物件是否支援當地語系化資源。

trans-unit.source: The object to get the language support persistence flag for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其取得語言支援保存性 (Persistence) 旗標的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified object must have its localizable values persisted in a resource.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示指定物件是否必須在資源中保存 (Persist) 其當地語系化的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the localizable values should be persisted in resources; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果資源中應該保存當地語系化的值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
